Package GUI

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
GUI.MainController
public class MainController extends Object
A class that controls all the tabs of the application window. It specifies all the controller classes, handles the switch of the tabs.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sevastian Bahynskyi

    • tabChanged

      public void tabChanged(Event event)
      Method that listens to the tab switches.
      Parameters:
      event - An action done by user. In our case, the tab has been changed.

    • handleMouseEvent

      public void handleMouseEvent(MouseEvent e) throws parser.ParserException
      Method that listens to the mouse clicks by user.
      Parameters:
      e - An action done by user. In this case, we the theme switch has been pressed.
      Throws:
      parser.ParserException

    • exportData

      public static void exportData() throws parser.ParserException
      Static method to be able to export data at any point. All the information is parsed into XML file.
      Throws:
      parser.ParserException
